definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The pulse discharge phenomena of gas-liquid mixture in wire-wire gap are studied.

sentences.english: Simultaneously, the SP aluminum thick film layer is the rear electrode.

sentences.english: The methods for measuring the geometry dimension of graphite electrode tapered nipples as well as the measurement mechanism adopted are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了测量石墨电极接头的各种方法及测量原理。

sentences.english: The zinc nail and the copper penny are called electrodes.
sentences.chinese: 镀锌钉和铜硬币就是电池的电极。

sentences.english: Wood or glass-fiber spacers are used to prevent the electrodes form touching.
sentences.chinese: 电极衬有木头或玻璃纤维以防电极腐蚀。

sentences.english: The adsorption behaviour of methylene blue was discussed in detail.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了亚甲蓝在玻碳电极表面的吸附行为。

sentences.english: While a pair of hollow jacks without electrodes are correspondingly and additionally arranged on the lamp base.
sentences.chinese: 而在管座上对应地增设了一对不带电极的空心插孔。

sentences.english: The property of the reference electrode can be maintained for long term; namely the service life is extended.
sentences.chinese: 能长期保持参比电极的性能延长使用寿命。

sentences.english: Nafion membranes have been most widely used as a PEM in fuel cells.

sentences.english: The working properties depend on the gate bias voltage and the structure of pectinate Al electrode.
sentences.chinese: 其工作特性依赖于栅极电压和梳状铝电极的结构。

sentences.english: The photocurrent of Copper-Cobalt alloys electrodes changes with the concentration of cobalt.
sentences.chinese: 铜钴合金电极的光响应随含钴量而变化。

sentences.english: A palladium phthalocyanine-PVC membrane electrode for thiocyanate ion was prepared.
